name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Omaru Poruka Birthday Concert2024!! POL ROCK FES!!!!! [W25VvoWh5zY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka performing "Crow Song" while playing the guitar on stage.
Transition between songs. Polka prepares for the next performance. A title card for "Kanjou no Pixel" appears.
Omaru Polka performing "Kanjou no Pixel" (感情のピクセル) by Okazaki Taiiku.
scenes.song_name: Kanjou no Pixel (感情のピクセル)

subtitles.original: いつまでもあぁここにいるよ
subtitles.english: I'll be here forever.

subtitles.original: 通り過ぎて行く人の中
subtitles.english: Amidst the people passing by.

subtitles.original: 闇に閉ざされたステージで
subtitles.english: On this stage closed in by darkness...

subtitles.original: 今希望の歌を歌うよ
subtitles.english: ...I'll sing a song of hope now.

subtitles.original: あなただって疲れてるでしょう
subtitles.english: You're tired too, aren't you?

subtitles.original: その背中に持たれのけたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to lean against your back.

subtitles.original: こんな暗闇の中からの一歩を
subtitles.english: Taking a step from within this darkness...

subtitles.original: 照らす光を歌う
subtitles.english: ...I'll sing of the light that shines.

subtitles.original: その歌を
subtitles.english: That song...

subtitles.original: その歌を
subtitles.english: That song...

subtitles.original: 感情のピクセル
subtitles.english: Kanjou no Pixel (The Pixels of Emotion)

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲 岡崎体育
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition by Okazaki Taiiku

subtitles.original: 重ねた手のひら　翳せばもう見えなくなる
subtitles.english: If you hold up your overlapping palms, they'll be hidden from view.

subtitles.original: 風の色はもう見えなくなる
subtitles.english: The color of the wind can no longer be seen.

subtitles.original: 怯えて震える体を焼き尽くしてゆく
subtitles.english: Burning away your trembling, frightened body.

subtitles.original: もう何もかも信じたくはない
subtitles.english: I don't want to believe in anything anymore.

subtitles.original: I don't feel pixel... Go back to fire.
subtitles.english: I don't feel pixel... Go back to fire.

subtitles.original: 希望を辿ったって何も変わらないよ
subtitles.english: Even if you follow hope, nothing will change.

subtitles.original: どうぶつさんたち大集合だわいわい
subtitles.english: Animal friends, everyone gather round, yay yay!

subtitles.original: おいでよ　うさぎさん　きつねさん
subtitles.english: Come over here, bunny and fox!

subtitles.original: たぬきさん　ゾウさん
subtitles.english: Raccoon and elephant!

subtitles.original: みんなで楽しく　うんぱっぱのぶんぶん
subtitles.english: Let's all have fun, unpappa bunbun!

subtitles.original: おなかぽんぽんぽんのやっほー
subtitles.english: Tummy pon pon pon, yippee!

subtitles.original: チーターさんも駆けっこじゃ負けないぞ
subtitles.english: Cheetah-san won't lose in a race either!

subtitles.original: 過去を消し去るように走れ
subtitles.english: Run as if to erase the past!

subtitles.original: いくぞ！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: Don't you fuck with me!
subtitles.english: Don't you fuck with me!

subtitles.original: 狂い出したイメージと
subtitles.english: With an image that's started to go mad...

subtitles.original: 絶望の隙間に消え落ちてゆく
subtitles.english: ...it vanishes into the cracks of despair.

subtitles.original: 零れ落とした　闇雲なアンサー
subtitles.english: The reckless answer that spilled out...

subtitles.original: まだ見つからないまま
subtitles.english: ...remains yet to be found.

subtitles.original: 風の色はもう見えないけど
subtitles.english: I can't see the color of the wind anymore, but...

subtitles.original: 前までは見えてた怖ぁ
subtitles.english: ...it's scary because I could see it before.

subtitles.original: I don't feel pixel! Go back to fire!
subtitles.english: I don't feel pixel! Go back to fire!

subtitles.original: Step on the pixel... yeah!
subtitles.english: Step on the pixel... yeah!

subtitles.original: どうぶつさんたち大集合だわいわい
subtitles.english: Animal friends, everyone gather round, yay yay!

subtitles.original: おいでよ　ワニさん　仲間に入れてあげて
subtitles.english: Come over here, alligator, let him join the group!

subtitles.original: ワニさんを　仲間に入れてあげて
subtitles.english: Let alligator join the group!

subtitles.original: みんなで楽しく　うんぱっぱのぶんぶん
subtitles.english: Let's all have fun, unpappa bunbun!

subtitles.original: おなかぽんぽんぽんのやっほー
subtitles.english: Tummy pon pon pon, yippee!

subtitles.original: ワニさんも仲間にいれてあげて
subtitles.english: Let alligator join the group too!

subtitles.original: ワニさんも仲間にいれてあげて
subtitles.english: Let alligator join the group too!

subtitles.original: HORN READY!
subtitles.english: HORN READY!

subtitles.original: Aaaaah!
subtitles.english: Aaaaah!

subtitles.original: COME ON!
subtitles.english: COME ON!

subtitles.original: 分かち合えない
subtitles.english: Unable to share...

subtitles.original: 生き物としてのカテゴリライズの壁
subtitles.english: ...the walls of categorization as creatures.

subtitles.original: 乾いた果実も
subtitles.english: Even a dried fruit...

subtitles.original: 一度乾くともう戻れない
subtitles.english: Once it's dried, it can never go back.

subtitles.original: どうぶつさんたち大集合だわいわい
subtitles.english: Animal friends, everyone gather round, yay yay!

subtitles.original: そろそろ　ワニさんも仲間に入れてあげて
subtitles.english: It's about time to let alligator join the group!

subtitles.original: みんなで楽しく　うんぱっぱのぶんぶん
subtitles.english: Let's all have fun, unpappa bunbun!

subtitles.original: おなかぽんぽんぽんのやっほー
subtitles.english: Tummy pon pon pon, yippee!

subtitles.original: さすがに気の毒になってくる　思いやりという裏の冒涜的価値の再認識
subtitles.english: As expected, it becomes pitiable. Re-recognizing the blasphemous value behind what's called "compassion".

subtitles.original: ワニさんも仲間に入れてあげて
subtitles.english: Let alligator join the group too!
